snippet: The Lakers beat the host Wizards, 102-96, on Friday to end a four-game losing streak.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers beat Washington Wizards, 102-96; other basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Lakers beat the host Wizards, 102-96, on Friday to end a four-game losing streak.

headline.main: Lakers Find Way to Win as Wizards Fall to 3-17
headline.print_headline: Lakers Find Way to Win As Wizards Fall to 3-17
